Bacterial Spot.recommended_treatment: Use copper-based bactericides and avoid overhead watering.
Bacterial Spot.symptoms: Small, dark spots with yellow halos on leaves and fruits.

Early Blight.recommended_treatment: Use fungicides like chlorothalonil or copper-based sprays.
Early Blight.symptoms: Dark spots with concentric rings on leaves.

Healthy.recommended_treatment: No treatment needed. Keep monitoring the plant.
Healthy.symptoms: Leaves appear healthy, green, and uniform.

Late Blight.recommended_treatment: Apply fungicides early; destroy infected plants.
Late Blight.symptoms: Dark, water-soaked lesions with white mold under leaves.

Leaf Mold.recommended_treatment: Ensure good ventilation and apply sulfur-based sprays.
Leaf Mold.symptoms: Yellow spots on upper side, moldy growth underneath.

Septoria Leaf Spot.recommended_treatment: Remove infected leaves; use fungicides with mancozeb.
Septoria Leaf Spot.symptoms: Small, circular spots with gray centers and dark borders.

Target Spot.symptoms: Dark concentric rings forming a target-like appearance.

Yellow Leaf Curl Virus.symptoms: Curling and yellowing of young leaves.

Mosaic Virus.symptoms: Mottled yellow/green patterns and stunted growth.

Two-Spotted Spider Mite.recommended_treatment: Spray miticides; wash leaves with water.
Two-Spotted Spider Mite.symptoms: Tiny yellow dots and fine webbing on leaves.
